modShortDescription: SMX Menu Patch is used to patch SMX Menu to the current 7 Days to Die experimental branch. Dependencies: SMX Menu. Install it as any other mod.
modDescription:
SMX Menu Patch is used to patch SMX Menu to the current 7 Days to Die experimental branch.

* Dependencies: [SMX Menu](https://7daystodiemods.com/smx-menu-mod-for-a18/)
* Install it as any other mod and run it along side SMX Menu from the stable release branch.

**[Download](https://github.com/Sirillion/SMXmenuPatch/archive/master.zip)**

If you feel like making a donation to support the development of the SMX mods, use [this link](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=5VLRBAFXDCXBC&item_name=SMX+Development&currency_code=NOK&source=url).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/14574-smxmenu-a18).

**Credits:** [Sirillion](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/sirillion/)
